label:english: He is probably breaking the law
label:luganda: Aba ayinza okuba nga amenya amateeka

label:english: Yes, he is definitely breaking the law

label:luganda: Aba ayinza okuba nga tamenya mateeka

label:english: They should wait for the situation to improve on its own
Obedience of the woman to the man
He will probably not do so again

label:luganda: Katandise omukuba, wakumukuba pakka era obulamu bwe bujja kuba mumatiga.

label:english: Women like her suffer greatly when they are hit by their husbands

label:luganda: Nedda, sagala kwenyigira mu nsonga z'abantu ez'ekyama

label:english: They would say that I did the right thing
They would scold me for gossiping and starting rumors
Find a tutor to instruct your child until the teacher comes back
label:luganda: Nfuna omuyigisa nasomesa omwana okutuusa nga omusomesa akomyewo

label:english: Tell the LC1 chairperson to investigate why the headmaster has allowed this problem to occur
label:luganda: Okugamba ssentebe wa'LC1 okunonyeleza lwaki omukulu we'someero yakiliza ekizibuu kino okubawo

label:english: Find a tutor to instruct your child until the teacher comes back
label:luganda: Nfuna omuyigisa nasomesa omwana okutuusa nga omusomesa akomyewo

label:english: Investigate why the headmaster has allowed this problem to occur in my role as LC1 chairperson

label:english: Immediately begin organizing a PTA meeting, even if you know this might start some trouble
label:luganda: Mangu ddala okutandika okuteekateeka olukiiko lwa PTA, nebwoba nga omanyi nti kiyinza okutandikawo enkayana/emitawaana

label:english: Wait another few days to see if the problem corrects itself
label:luganda: Okulindako enaku endala ntono okulaba oba ekizibu kyeetereeza

label:luganda: Osaba omukulu we'ssomero okuteeka omwana wo mu'kibiina ekilala okutuusa ng'omusomesa akomyewo

label:english: Teachers who are not showing up for class need to take their jobs more seriously
label:luganda: Abasomesa abatalabikako mu kibiina balina okutwaala emirimu gy'abwe ng’ekikulu

label:english: Teachers who are not showing up for class likely do not get paid regularly and need to make money in other ways.
label:luganda: Abasomesa abatalabikako mu kibiina kisoboka okuba nga tebasasulwa bulijjo nga kibetagiisa okukola sente mungeri endala ezenjawulo.

label:english: A teacher can never justify being chronically absent from school during teaching hours
label:luganda: Omusomesa tasobola kunyonyola kwebulankanya kusomesa musawa ezokusoma emirundi egyomudiringanwa.

label:english: Teachers mostly have good reasons for being absent from school during teaching hours
label:luganda: Abasomesa ebisera ebisinga balina ensonga enambulukufu okwosa kusomero musaawa ezokusooma

label:english: Parents should call a meeting of the PTA and hold the school accountable for the teacher's absence
label:luganda: Abazadde balina okuyitanga akakiiko kabazadde nebateeka eninga kusomero kulwokwosa kwabasomesa.

label:english: Parents’ intervention only leads to conflict and discord. It’s better to leave the management of the school to the administrators
label:luganda: Okwenyigiramu kwabazadde kuleeta buleesi nkayana nakweswaza.kisingako okubirekera akakiiko kesomero.

label:english: Parents’ intervention only leads to conflict and discord. It’s better to leave the management of the school to the administrators
label:luganda: Okwenyigiramu kwa bazadde kuleeta buleesi nkayana nakweswaza.kisingako okubirekera akakiiko k'esomero.

label:english: Parents should call a meeting of the PTA and hold the school accountable for the teacher's absence
label:luganda: Abazadde balina okuyitanga akakiiko kabazadde nebateeka eninga kusomero kulwokwosa kwabasomesa.

label:english: More like the first villages, where parents wait to get all the facts
label:luganda: Okusinga ng’ekyaalo ekisooka, abazadde mwebalinda okufuna obukakafu bwonna

label:english: More like the second villages, where parents immediately confront the headmaster
label:luganda: Okusinga ng’ekyaalo ekyokubiri, abazadde mwebasitukirawo nebakungaana era nebalumba omukulu w’essomero

label:english: It is hard to organize if parents get together to do something about teacher absenteeism and anything they achieve will quickly disappear
label:luganda: Kizibu okukunganya abazadde okujja awamu okubako kyebakola ku kwosa kwabsomesa era nekyebajjamu kijja kuvaawo mangu ddala

label:english: Parents can come together over a long stretch of time and reduce absenteeism
label:luganda: Abazadde basobola okujja awamu okumala akaseera akawanvu nebakendeeza okwosa

label:english: Teachers almost always come to class
label:luganda: Abasomesa kyenkana bajja mu kibiina buli kiseera

label:english: Teachers skip class every now and then
Teachers almost never come to class
From the villages in your trading center
label:luganda: Baava mu byalo byo mu senta eno

label:english: From villages in other trading centers
label:luganda: Baava mu byalo byo mu senta endaala

label:english: Even more than once a month
Less than three times a year
Something like this would never happen in my village
label:luganda: Kino tekisobola kutukawo ku kyalo kyange

label:english: Something like this could happen, but it is not very likely
This is the sort of thing that sometimes happens in my village
label:luganda: Kino kyekimu ku bintu ebitela okubawo ku kyalo kyange

label:english: Things like this are very common in my village
label:luganda: Bino bibelawo nyo mu kyalo kyange

label:english: Between once a week and once month
label:luganda: Wakati w'omulundi ogumu mu wiiki n'omulundi ogumu mu mwezi

label:english: Less than once a month, but more than once a year
label:luganda: Wansi wa mulundu gumu mu mwezi, naye okusuka omulundi ogumu mu mwaka

label:english: Less than once a year or almost never
label:luganda: Teguwera mulundi gumu mumwaka, oba tekiberawo ddala

label:english: Intervene to break up fights between people
Punish those who do bad things
Mobilize people to go to vote at election time
label:luganda: Okubiliza abantu okwetaba mubyokulonda mu kisera ky'okulonda

label:english: Organize community service days where the community comes together to fix roads and clean up rubbish
label:luganda: Okutegeka enaku abantu ku kyalo ze bakunganilamu okulongosa enguddo n'okukunganya kasasiro ku kyalo

label:english: Lobby LC3 and LC5 chairmen to spend more money on the community
label:luganda: Okukubiriza ba chairman ba LC3 ne LC5 okwongela okusasanya ensimbi ku kyalo

label:english: Work with NGOs to facilitate development projects such as building boreholes or building a school
label:luganda: Okukolagana n'ebitongole bya nakyewa mukuletta pulojekiti z'enkulakulana nga amasomero, oba nayikonda

label:english: The friend who wants to call the police
The friend who wants to punish the thief now
It is better to punish the accused there and then even if you are not certain of their guilt, because otherwise they might get away with it
label:luganda: Kisingako okubonereza avunanyibwa awo wenyini nebwekiba nti tewekakasa oba yomusobya kubanga ayinza okusimatuka

label:english: You should get all of the facts before deciding whether to punish someone even if it means that guilty people will sometimes escape punishment
label:luganda: Olina okusoka okufuna obukakafu obumala nga tonaba kusalawo kuboneleza muntu nebwekiba kitegeza nti omusobya ebisera ebimu asimatuka ekibonerezo.

label:english: He should have been punished more
It’s the government’s responsibility to provide all children a quality education
